sentences.english: Realized the parents make money is not easy, thus swears off the bad habit of randomly spends.
sentences.chinese: 體會父母掙錢不易，從而戒掉亂花錢的壞習慣。

sentences.english: She splashed out on several handbags.
sentences.chinese: 她亂花錢，買了好幾個手袋。

sentences.english: So who ended up wasting money?
sentences.chinese: 所以究竟是誰亂花錢了？

sentences.english: If there's anything that got me in trouble financially, it's impulse spending.
sentences.chinese: 如果有什麼事情使我陷入經濟危機，那就是亂花錢。

sentences.english: Don't throw  about  your money on trash.
sentences.chinese: 不要亂花錢買無用的東西。

sentences.english: But I still say Americans spend a lot more money on useless things than we Chinese do.
sentences.chinese: 但我還是認爲美國人比我們中國人愛亂花錢。

sentences.english: The girl was lectured at on her spending habits.
sentences.chinese: 女孩因自己亂花錢的習慣而受到訓斥。

sentences.english: He flings his money about on expensive luxuries.
sentences.chinese: 他亂花錢買一些昂貴的奢侈品。

sentences.english: Cases involving off-books accounts and arbitrary spending in violation of regulations will be investigated and dealt with severely.
sentences.chinese: 嚴厲查處設立小金庫和各種違反規定亂花錢的行爲。

sentences.english: B: But I still say Americans spend a lot more money on useless things than we Chinese do.
sentences.chinese: 但我還是認爲美國人比我們中國人愛亂花錢。

sentences.english: I’ve learned to control my impulses, at least a little better.
sentences.chinese: 我已經學會控制不亂花錢，至少是好點了。

sentences.english: Now that he is a successful businessman, Mr. B spends money like water.
sentences.chinese: 先生既然是位成功的商人，他就奢侈地亂花錢。

sentences.english: The child is wasteful with money, so I am going to cut his allowance.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子太愛亂花錢，這月要節減他的零花錢。

sentences.english: Three envelopes, and when they’re empty, I’ve spent my allotment.
sentences.chinese: 當這三個信封一空，我就不再亂花錢。

sentences.english: The key here is when you’ve saved some money, don’t spend it.
sentences.chinese: 這裏關鍵是你什麼時候需要省錢，不要亂花錢。
